snippet: WEINRIB--Jay. A man with a special gift to make us laugh and enjoy. I have lost my best friend but his wonderful spirit will always remain. Alvin Schragis and Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEINRIB--Jay. A man with a special gift to make us laugh and enjoy. I have lost my best friend but his wonderful spirit will always remain. Alvin Schragis and Family 1/3
